alert.note: Alert for Lower Hells Canyon, Salmon River Region; Orofino, Grangeville Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 01 at 6:05AM MST until February 02 at 3:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 2 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches and higher amounts of 3 to 5 inches over White Bird Hill. * WHERE...Camas Prairie, Grangeville and vicinity, Greer Grade, Highway 95 Slate Creek to Riggins, and White Bird Grade. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 2 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Lower Hells Canyon, Salmon River Region; Orofino, Grangeville Region
